Name: Litedark
Review Text: I had the number 523  Butternut Squash and Goat Cheese Quesadilla along with a green energy smoothie. Excellent food and an affordable lunch by Amsterdam standards. Location is excellent.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Ordered a bit if everything & staff was amazing. Very patient. Clean & very cute and comfortable to relax at while you wait or eat there. All very healthy options & environmentally friendly packaging. We even bought extras of their to go …

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Wonderful food and friendly and professional staff, I was very surprised how good the food is and  I’ll go back for one of the smoothie’s that everyone was ordering 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 …

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Very good juices, freshly made. Good selection, friendly staff, and great taste! Highly recommended

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Seriously tasty food and the juices are top notch too. Tried the power balls (coconut) protein ball, basil xtc juice, SW1 salad of beetroot and goats cheese with luscious scatter of a variety of nuts and the quiche. Yummy. Excellent fuel food for the body. Lovely friendly staff 👌🏼

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Great selection of delicious and healthy (and reasonably priced) food and drink options - with clear "free from" labelling to indicate gluten free, dairy free, nut free options. Comfy atmosphere and friendly, helpful staff. Far too easy to spend a lot longer than you intended! I intend to return.

Name: Litedark
Review Text:
Great smoothie selection to choose from! Our go-to breakfast / brunch place.

Also offers nice selection of paninis, wraps/salads and quesadilas - all made fresh on the spot.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: The owner can do no wrong in my opinion. High-protein vegetable smoothies, power balls and healthy quiches served by beautiful & friendly staff in a trendy, if small, shop front playing quiet house music all day, every day. The perfect place for sustaining a body in a city with so many abusive temptations.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Fresh juices in funky bottles and a great selection of energy-food! Pricey, but worth it! And Litedark is also in the ResQ-App!

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Great selects of drinks. The staff are really chill, even thought if the room is really warm because of the oven in the side. 😁

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Healthy and tasty food but incredibly slow, if you are in any sort of rush and there are any others waiting then consider going elsewhere or you may be looking at 25 minutes+ wait for a sandwich

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Love the hot shakes and protein balls. Staff is very friendly!

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Amazing juices!  Amazing staff!  So glad we stopped.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: I <3 this place so much!  Try the no-milk hot chocolate.  It's fabulous.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Very friendly staff with tasty food and great coffee.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Very good and healthy food, not the fastest but very friendly staff.

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Best hot chocolate with a lot of plant base milk options

Name: Litedark
Review Text: The pricing of the juices are a bit steep

Name: Litedark
Review Text: Amazing juice lab

Name: Litedark

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Fresh, healthy and original dishes. Expensive for the amount you get - one dish is too little for lunch, so you are quickly at € 14 / € 15. And the staff does not seem to work very efficiently yet, they are actually …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Menus only in English; there I was with my mentally disabled sister and my elderly mother. Comment from the waitress: "It is Amsterdam here." Yes, exactly: I think a city located in the Netherlands. With me, my mother …

Name: Litedark
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Simple, original and delicious, I took the quiche with goat cheese, pears, red onions and spinach as well as the pink elephant juice and I was pleasantly surprised and will come back. …

Name: Litedark
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Cheap meal, good, fresh, and if you want to eat organic and vegetarian, it's for you. I advise all of times to take two dishes to be quite stalled (~ 5 € / dishes) …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Spontaneous, hospitable service, lunch was delicious. And the sugarfree Ice Green with ginger was TOP! Nice and thirst-quenching with this warm weather. …
